dishes.name: 000 Chocolate Banana Chiaseed Pudding

ingredients.name: Almond or Oat Milk (any is fine)

instructions: Mix (stir) maple syrup, milk, cocoa powder, chia seeds together in a mason jar (place ingredients in that order).
Wait ~5 minutes.
Stir mixture again.
Refridgerate minimum 4 hours.
Slice banana, and place chocolate chips, crushed almonds, and banana on top.
notes: Special choc chips required for Dairy Free.

dishes.name: 001 Apple Pie Chiaseed Pudding

ingredients.name: Almond or Oat Milk (any is fine)

instructions: Mix (stir) maple syrup, milk, apple sauce, chia seeds, and 1/4 tsp cinnamon together in a mason jar (place ingredients in that order).
Wait ~5 minutes.
Stir mixture again.
Refridgerate minimum 4 hours.
Peal and slice apple into edible chunks.
Just before serving, cook apple chunks, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp cinnamon in a saucepan lined with the coconut oil.
Place toppings on top with a pinch of cinnamon.
notes: Apple suggestions: Kanzi (EU), Envy (NZ), Pink Lady (WA), Bravo (WA), Cosmic Crisp (US) - in that order.

dishes.name: 002 Chilli Con Carne
instructions: Dice Onion and brown over medium heat.
Add 1 tsp chilli powder, 1 tsp cumin, 1tsp cinnamon, beef mince and brown.
Add diced tomatoes, tomato puree, 1 tbsp oregano, and 1 beef stock cube (crumbled) - mix.
Add a little bit of hot water, mix, bring to simmer (reduce  heat slightly).
Simmer with lid on for 20min. Stirring every ~5min.
On the side, cook rice and leave to sit.
Add drained and washed kidney beans to chilli mixture, stir, leave lid off for 10 minutes. Stirring every ~5min.
Stir again, leave to rest for ~15min. Serve.
notes: Also goes well with mashed/jacket potato.
Gluten Free (!) -> Ensure stock cube has no gluten.
